apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

chart.description: Chart specifies the chart that contains the respective resources for component features and the UI wizard.

sourceRef.description: TypedObjectReference represents an typed namespaced object.

name.description: Name of the referent. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

namespace.description: Namespace of the referent. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/namespaces/

description.description: Description specifies a short description of the services this feature set provides.

icons.description: Icons is an optional list of icons for an application. Icon information includes the source, size, and mime type. These icons will be used in UI.

items.description: ImageSpec contains information about an image used as an icon.

size.description: (optional) The size of the image in pixels (e.g., 25x25).

src.description: The source for image represented as either an absolute URL to the image or a Data URL containing the image. Data URLs are defined in RFC 2397.

type.description: (optional) The mine type of the image (e.g., "image/png").

recommended.description: Required specify whether this feature set is mandatory or not for using the UI.

requiredFeatures.description: RequiredFeatures specifies list of features that are necessary to consider this feature set as ready.

title.description: Title specify the title of this feature set.

dependents.description: Dependents specifies the feature sets which depend on this FeatureSet

featureSets.description: FeatureSets specifies a list of FeatureSet names that depend on this FeatureSet

features.description: Features specifies the Feature names of the dependent FeatureSet

name.description: Name specifies the name of the dependent FeatureSet

enabled.description: Enabled specifies whether this feature set is enabled or not.

features.description: Features specifies the status of the component features that belong to this feature set.

enabled.description: Enabled specifies whether the component feature has been enabled or not.

managed.description: Managed specifies whether the component is managed by platform or not.

name.description: Name specify the name of the component feature.

ready.description: Ready specifies whether the component feature is ready or not.

note.description: Note specifies the respective reason if the feature set is considered as disabled.

ready.description: Ready specifies whether this feature set is ready not.
